backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles, score submission, daily score filtering, progression updates, and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across pages, game logic, UI, and APIs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the main React application; sets title to Neon Doge.
frontend/src/api/useLeaderboards.ts: React Query hooks fetching daily and all-time leaderboards from the backend actor.
frontend/src/api/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving and saving the authenticated user's profile via the backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling game state, viewport setup, authentication checks, and routing between screens.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and status handling.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Modal that collects and saves a new user's display name via a profile creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx: Renders the in‑game HUD showing score, streak, multiplier, coins, time, and pause control.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Displays daily and all‑time leaderboards with tab switching, entry listing, and a close button.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides UI for toggling sound, reduced motion, and editing keybindings, with a close button.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Defines simple oscillator‑based sound effects for hit, coin, and power‑up events.
frontend/src/game/balance/difficulty.ts: Calculates difficulty scaling over time, adjusting obstacle speed, spawn rate, and score multiplier.
frontend/src/game/fx/particles.ts: Creates particle burst effects with randomized motion, size, and lifetime.
frontend/src/game/fx/screenShake.ts: Returns a shake intensity value used to trigger screen shake effects.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Handles canvas sizing and the render loop, integrating game state, input, and rendering functions.
frontend/src/game/gameTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all game entities, input state, and game state structure.
frontend/src/game/input/usePlayerInput.t: Tracks pointer and keyboard input to update target player position based on bindings and movement rules.
frontend/src/game/renderer.ts: Renders the full game frame including background, player, obstacles, power‑ups, particles, and screen shake.
frontend/src/game/useGameLoop.ts: Implements the main game loop, handling updates for obstacles, power-ups, particles, scoring, timers, and game-over events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for submitting scores and unlocking perks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisualViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport changes and updates a CSS variable to maintain stable viewport height.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, fonts, base styles, and viewport handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the gameplay screen, managing pause state, settings, HUD updates, and passing events to the game canvas.
frontend/src/pages/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the main menu with branding, login, navigation to leaderboard, unlocks, settings, and game start.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsScreen.tsx: Displays final game stats, awards coins, and auto-submits the score if authenticated.
frontend/src/progression/perks.ts: Defines the list of unlockable perks with their metadata and costs.
frontend/src/progression/UnlocksShop.tsx: Renders the perk unlock shop where players spend coins to unlock perks.
Manages player progression state, coin balance, perk unlocks, and best score persistence.
frontend/src/settings/settingsTypes.ts: Declares settings interfaces and default input, audio, and motion settings.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: Handles loading, updating, and persisting user settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and pending feature requests for Neon Doge.
